column3: News;Kompong Speu:------ A fire at the Golden Rice factory
column9: has caused two people to die and burned a car and equipment. ------According to a report by Fresh News Agency in Kompong Speu province
column10: in the cause of a fire
column11: at the rice mill is not yet known. The names of the two victims
column13: were not confirmed.------The Golden Rice Factory
column15: suffered a previous fire in 2017.------Fresh News
